title: one for all was fun for two games
body: then you realize the winning comes down to which team has the "I didn't want x" champion whiner

replies.body: One for all was fun, just hated the fact that people picked the same champions over and over.  Yea sure playing Lux is fun on One for all, just not that people pick her every damn game.
whats one for all,dont you mean everyone picks heimer cause its SOOO HILAREOUS for the 2839742389572th time.

Played 3 games. 

Yas vs Yas was as close to being a Super Saiyan as I will ever be

I played 1 game of it with Fiddlesticks (I was the one that voted him)

It was fun but I didn't feel like playing it again since then for some reason
